website_summaries.verdict: Nasacort has been a top seller since it was available only in prescription form and remains an effective and popular allergy relief nasal spray.
pros: Works for up to 24 hours to relieve numerous symptoms brought on by many types of seasonal allergens
Use it just once per day
Same strength as the original Nasacort prescription
Unscented, and doesn't have a bad flavor
cons: May cause some side effects typical to steroid sprays, such as nose and throat irritation
Some consumers said it didn't work for them
Rare reports of broken bottles upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: DON’T BUY
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed with this order. The product packaging came opened/someone unsealed it and usually with a nose spray you have to pump the sprayer a couple times before the spray will start to come out and these had already been primed. I don’t feel safe using this product and unfortunately Amazon will not do a return on this. I’m very annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: Sent me an opened product.
customer_reviews.text: I don't think you're supposed to take medicine that has been opened/unsealed.
customer_reviews.author: BAM

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in an open box
customer_reviews.text: Nasacort box arrived open and amazon does not allow for returns and does not provide a mechanism to report a problem. Given that this goes in my NOSE I am not comfortable using a product that comes in an open box.
customer_reviews.author: Tina C

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived open. Looked used.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived completely open with the spray outside of package. Looks used.
customer_reviews.author: gova

customer_reviews.title: Uncertain
customer_reviews.text: We are not sure what to think about this shipment, we have order before and always been well pleased. This time the package arrived in good condition, but the product packaging inside the box had been opened and both bottles were loose in the box. We are not sure if it is safe to use or not.
customer_reviews.author: Keith A. Yoder

customer_reviews.title: Nasal spray seems altered and refilled with water!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using nasacort for a long time and works wonderful with my allergies but I ordered this product and the one i got was somehow altered it feels like its just water instead of allergy med.
customer_reviews.author: claudia M

customer_reviews.title: Security?
customer_reviews.text: Package was opened and each bottle had no safety seal
customer_reviews.author: Heather Conn

customer_reviews.title: Opened box and cap
customer_reviews.text: This product was opened and CPA was removed from one of the spray. I don't want to use something that is delivered out of box and don't know if it has been used since CPA was also removed.
customer_reviews.author: Tariq

customer_reviews.title: NOTHING!!!!
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews I thought I'd give it a try for my Post Nasal Drip and not being able to Breathe at night.After all it is supposed to be a Steroid.NOT!!! This is no better than Saline spray and I can't return.SHAME...Total ripoff..someone should be accountable for this Mis- representation.Another 18 bucks down the Proverbial Drain.
customer_reviews.author: Charlane Valade

customer_reviews.title: Excellent treatment for nasal allergies.  One squirt per day provides great relief.
customer_reviews.text: If you have problems with hay fever or other nasal allergy problems, I HIGHLY recommend Nasacort. I started using it years ago when it was still prescription and my doctor recommended it. It is very effective, and I experience no side effects like drowsiness. Important note: Nasacort isn't like a fast-acting antihistamine: You need to use it every day, and you won't experience any effect for about a week. Once it kicks in, it will provide excellent nasal relief. Remember to continue using it every day even if your symptoms subside for a period.
customer_reviews.author: Tennessee Phil

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I am easy to get hit by sorethroat. I saw reviews from other buyers than I decide to buy it ever since, loving it! UPDATE: March 25, 2020: The package came in ripped! This is ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: Simon Hutabarat

customer_reviews.title: It is great in the fall.
customer_reviews.text: This product is as good as any on the market. I don't have to use it daily. I found every two to three days works for me. The problem I encountered is after ordering. I received the exact shipment the following month. I did not reorder. After I reread my order I found it was an automatic monthly order. I cancelled the automatic order. I don't recall ever seeing the monthly shipment. Beware if you order this.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was ripped open.
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the shipping box, the packaging to the Nasacort was ripped open and the two unsealed bottles of product were just rolling around in there. You honestly think I want to spray an unsealed bottle of anything up my nose while there is a global pandemic happening???!! What a joke, and a waste of money. Thanks for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Package was open
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t tried the actual product as the package was open already and one of the bottles appeared to be used. There weren’t any safety seals. Doesn’t allow returns. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe and unacceptable packaging
customer_reviews.text: This product was already open with no safety seals in place. It appears to be previously used. This is extremely unsafe and unacceptable. I have emailed customer service because it said the item cannot be returned. I have also filed a report with the FDA since I've seen similar complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep in months!!
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews. Ordered this product out of desperation and after reading many other positive reviews. I’ve suffered for weeks at a time, months over my life at age 52 now. ONE DAY, the first day I received this and I went to sleep with clear sinuses, and slept the most peaceful restful sleep in ages....because I could BREATHE! Long deep Nasal breaths no problem all night. As you can tell I’m thrilled. This stuff is the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Guy

customer_reviews.title: possible counterfeit product
customer_reviews.text: arrived with both bottles loose in the envelope, tastes completely different than all other Nasacort sprays I've used every year for the last 5 years! will contact the manufacturer about formula changes. I'm very suspicious, especially after reading all the other negative comments!....ugh!.....
customer_reviews.author: Michael Radford

customer_reviews.title: To start sealing the CANTAINER I ordered before you ship it.
customer_reviews.text: I dislike this order because every time I order this item is because its always Opened, it is not sealed so please try sealing this carton container before you ship it. That's very dangerous because it a SPRAY you put in your nose for allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Stockton

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: First of all the price I bought this at (I'm sure it'll change at some point) was great, saved a ton vs buying it at a local store. I used to use flonase, but that did nothing for my allergies, the smell of the stuff I think actually just made me feel worse. This works much better. I am allergic to basically the entire outdoors, so between this, and staying inside quite a bit, I am able to manage without going through a box of tissues every couple days.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Mcbunny

customer_reviews.title: Package unsealed
customer_reviews.text: The package came opened and this is medicine it should be sealed I do not feel safe using it because of it being unsealed here to return it it says that this is a non-returnable item so am I just stuck with a bad product please help
customer_reviews.author: Android 9

customer_reviews.title: Fraud - opened product - no returns - Beware!
customer_reviews.text: Fraud alert! The product came opened with no returns. It’s super expensive and I’m definitely not taking chances with Covid in an open box nasal spray. DO NOT ORDER!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Package was open.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the package was open when the product arrived. I was given a refund, and was able to purchase the product new. Nasacort is outstanding, and works great for my allergies without drowsiness.
customer_reviews.author: DDIRECTS

customer_reviews.title: Best Value
customer_reviews.text: I live in Northern Florida and my allergies and congestion are intense, this definitely helps me breathe and keeps my allergies in check.
customer_reviews.author: Langi

customer_reviews.title: Life changing product
customer_reviews.text: Nasalcort has changed my life. I have always had sinus issues and for years have taken pills which usually come with some kind of side effects. Nasalcort is a spray that you take two pumps in each nostril and your done. I have tried Flonase and find that nasalcort works better for me. If you have allergy issues I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: John DTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Saves me from my allergies
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I’ve developed cat and dog allergies but that doesn’t stop me from loving every animal I see. Nasacort has allowed me to cuddle with my dog without worrying about having an allergy attack. This works much better than any other allergy medication I have tried before, especially any pills.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M.

customer_reviews.title: Opened product
customer_reviews.text: Opened product and cant return even though I received it a couple days ago. Dont buy it. I contacted amazon directly and they refunded me. Changing my stars from 1.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper online
customer_reviews.text: I used to use Nasonex, a prescription med, but it dried out my sinuses. My dr recommended Nasacort, an OTC med, that didn't contain alcohol. I tried it, liked it, but was disappointed it cost so much more than the prescription. Amazon's pricing for mutli packs is cheaper than what I can find in the store.
customer_reviews.author: Christy L

customer_reviews.title: Great nasal spray for allergies
customer_reviews.text: This clears my stuffy nose every morning and helps with breathing when my allergies are bad. Doesn't taste bad and sprays a heft mist.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: No more nasal polyps
customer_reviews.text: Was recommended to take this after getting nasal polyps removed. No polyps have returned!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Head

customer_reviews.title: Not safe for people with high blood pressure!
customer_reviews.text: This product is advertised safe for people who take blood pressure medication, but it is NOT! My blood pressure and heart rate went through the roof with the use of this product as directed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: I have terrible seasonal allergies and This product is getting me through allergy season like nothing before. I use 2 puffs in each nostril each day. The first week or so I used allergy tablets in addition just until the steroids actually kicked in. After you stick with it for about 2 weeks max. it’s so effective. I almost feel like I have no allergies at all, you just have to remember to keep using it once a day. Once I run out I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Rice

customer_reviews.title: Only allergy relief . Not if you need something to dry you out in sinus .
customer_reviews.text: I prefer fluticosonal spray sorry about spelling lol . Good for allergies though and not like otc spray you get stuck using or get problems when stop.
customer_reviews.author: Susan w.

customer_reviews.title: Very effective for allergies
customer_reviews.text: I've tried numerous products for my chronic allergies, and this is the only one that really works well. I spray once in each nostril in the morning, and in the evening about 12 hours apart. I'm a little concerned about any medication that I take long term, so I'll update this review if I notice any negative long term effects. Sometimes I don't get a full spray, so I prime it a little just to make sure I do get a full spray.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Foster

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy- open, unsealed package!
customer_reviews.text: Package was open and the spray was already primed. There were no seals on either bottle. These are always sealed from the store- I can’t use or return! Waste of money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received only one bottle in the two pack I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I received only one bottle of spray product in the two pack carton. The carton was open and one of the bottles was missing. The remaining bottle is not sealed so it's contents is compromised.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Barron

customer_reviews.title: Arrived opened already
customer_reviews.text: My product came opened. The front of the box was removed and one of the caps had come off the spray. It’s possible this was just due to rough transit but the outer packaging didn’t seem damaged at all. Because this is something I would inhale I don’t think I feel comfortable using it knowing it was potentially sent already open. I’d attach a photo but I don’t see an option to on the mobile app.
customer_reviews.author: Emma B

customer_reviews.title: OPENED PACKAGE UPON ARRIVAL-NO RETURNS OR EXCHANGES
customer_reviews.text: If opened packages with unsealed bottles is a known issue with this product, it should be disclosed by Amazon prior to purchase. Would you spray something up your nose that may have been tampered with?
customer_reviews.author: G. P. Kite III

customer_reviews.title: no safety protection
customer_reviews.text: second time I received this item... the secnd time was a replacement for item I received that has an open package with no safety sealer on the product... this came in the same way.... package open, product unprotected...
customer_reviews.author: Ronald A. LaMorte

customer_reviews.title: Items used.
customer_reviews.text: Package just arrived. The product packaging was squashed and both bottles looked like they'd been opened and used! Not acceptable. Of course I can't return or get a refund. These 2 bottles are going in the trash-a waste of money. Off to CVS I go.
customer_reviews.author: Shaila

customer_reviews.title: Seems like it works quickly!
customer_reviews.text: This works well! Esp for my daughter who's always stuffy. It gets the mucus out and seems to help with everyday allergies and regular sinus congestion. Hopefully it will last and make a big difference in her health and keep her decongested.
customer_reviews.author: MOMSTER24/7

customer_reviews.title: If you prefer Nasacort, this item is a great value
customer_reviews.text: I prefer Nasacort over Flonase for my severe, all-year-long upper respiratory allergy symptoms. Nasacort relives the symptoms better and faster than Flonase, for me. Also, I really hate the odor (like rotting flowers) and nasty taste of Flonase that runs down the back of the throat., Nasacort doesn't have an odor and no flavor. Everyone is different, and responses to medication can vary. If you prefer Nasacort, this item is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: MARLA

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and keeps clearer head overnight
customer_reviews.text: I use this before bed to keep my head from stuffing up. It works. I'm not sure I'd like the nasal spray in the mornings when I have to stand upright - I am obsessive about blowing my nose, and it would bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Jagroo

customer_reviews.title: Package Arrived Open
customer_reviews.text: Package came opened and not safety sealed. If it was safety sealed I would use it. Not returnable. I would really like to exchange it for another Nasacort.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for years and sometimes it saves me from getting a cold-like allergy. Makes my nasal symptoms go away and helps tons during allergy season. I use this and alternate with regular Claritin.
customer_reviews.author: Nommysushi

customer_reviews.title: Open box on a medication! Wtf!!?!?!?!?
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy! My nasacort was delivered as shown in the pictures....the packaging was beat up and opened. It looks like someone bought it at a store, opened it, took off the price tag, and returned it to amazon. I refuse to use this as it’s a medication and the box is open! Tried to return but Amazon says it’s not eligible for return. I’m pissed! This is not cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Davis

customer_reviews.title: Allergies be gone
customer_reviews.text: Nasacort works wonders for my seasonal allergies. I like that it's not a pill that I have to take each day. Easily portable. Begins to work well after 1 or 2 days and no symptoms for me with continued daily use. One of these lasts me the whole spring season.
customer_reviews.author: Louise B.

customer_reviews.title: Dont like using it
customer_reviews.text: Rather than a gentle spray it shoots the stream up your nose
customer_reviews.author: Michael T.

customer_reviews.title: It always works.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for several years, and beats the $80 Rx I used to buy our of my own pocket. Like many meds, one may work for one person and not another, but worth giving it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Kitsko

customer_reviews.title: no safety seal
customer_reviews.text: As with many others there's no way to tell if this has been tampered with or not. Check the packaging when it arrives and make sure you can tell it came from the manufacturer. If not return it. If you have it on a subscription you will have to check each order. Do not assume there's a safety seal on it.
customer_reviews.author: not happy

customer_reviews.title: Not in packaging
customer_reviews.text: I use nasacort regularly and love it however this product did not come in the regular packaging. It was not sealed, that’s not acceptable. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Kylah B.

customer_reviews.title: Works, must have for runny nose allergy
customer_reviews.text: This does work for me during allergy season, stops my nose completely. However, like all allergy medication, your nose will feel a bit weird right after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Eases allergies
customer_reviews.text: This is the only nasal spray that actually helps ease my daughter’s allergies. She has to use the name brand, as the generic doesn’t work for her.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Nasacort is great, but something is off here
customer_reviews.text: Nasacort is a great product; however, the product as sold by this vendor is suspicious. The packaging appeared to be done at someone’s home instead of by a manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unnerving Opening
customer_reviews.text: Delivered with the box already opened. I think Nasacort works well however as an adjunct to other allergy treatments.
customer_reviews.author: W. Davis

customer_reviews.title: The package was open
customer_reviews.text: The package was open and look like it being used
customer_reviews.author: denine

customer_reviews.title: Package opened
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but when I got it the package was opened so it was a waste of money. I am not sure i would order this again due to that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for me
customer_reviews.text: This product I have been using, even before it was a over the counter drug. Close to spring I began using and Stop in the fall.
customer_reviews.author: RLD

customer_reviews.title: Clears my congestion without any funny taste or smell and is non-additive like the other ...
customer_reviews.text: Nasacort works really well for me. Clears my congestion without any funny taste or smell and is non-additive like the other cheaper over-the-counter products. I was very happy to see that it is now being sold over-the-counter. No more visits to the doctor just to get a prescription for nasal spray. The best part is that my medical insurance carrier has no reason to increase my monthly premium just because I got a prescription for nasal spray.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie

customer_reviews.title: NO
customer_reviews.text: I received an already OPEN box. Taped closed? This is supposed to be a brand-new product!
customer_reviews.author: Christa b.

customer_reviews.title: Nasacort is Great For Stuffy Nose
customer_reviews.text: I have allergy & sinus issues that cause a constant stuffy nose. This product was recommended by a friend. Once I tried it the stuffy nose situation has been helped greatly. I think it says on the instructions to allow a bit of time for it to take affect. Follow that & give it a chance. It may or may not begin to clear up the situation immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: Amazon credited my account for the damaged product the same day.
customer_reviews.author: Bronxy1999

customer_reviews.title: A Game Changer!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome stuff. I tell everyone who is suffering from allergies to buy this. Give it about 7 to 10 days. Literally a game changer!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Package was opened
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this, I cannot return , but the product was opened and package was damaged. Very annoyed since its unusable now
customer_reviews.author: Moms

customer_reviews.title: Shipped package was opened and product not saftey sealed.
customer_reviews.text: When received my nasacort order the package product was opened already like many others. I have no idea what they could have put in the nasal spray bottles as replacement. Going to try and return product!
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: Opened package.
customer_reviews.text: Product had been previously opened and wrapped with shrink wrap. Not able to return of receive a refund. I refuse to use an unsafe medication. Waste of money, will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Volzer

customer_reviews.title: Best product I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best product I have ever use for sinus issues and allergies my allergist recommended this product can has no alcohol or smell does not irritate my nose
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great For Allergies
customer_reviews.text: I use Nasacort for my allergies and this product works. Easy to use, great value, good buy.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wilkow

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and unsafe to use
customer_reviews.text: UNACCEPTABLE! Unable to return because of the type of product. However, arrived unsealed. There is no way I’m risking using this spray, especially during a deadly pandemic! Are you kidding me?!
customer_reviews.author: Nina Paradiso

customer_reviews.title: Great for allergy sufferers
customer_reviews.text: No complaints here. Came timely, packaged neatly, and works very well. I take two sprays each nostril in the morning. Tilt head forward to avoid all the draining, and I’m good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Monica S

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: My seasonal allergies were getting out of hand. My eyes just wouldn't stop itching. I tried Flonase and it didn't help at all. After two or three weeks of constant itching, I switched to Nasacort. What a life saver! My eyes rarely itch. I don't have an itchy throat or constant sneezing.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Norris

customer_reviews.title: This product works very well.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as a prescription by my physician but came out over-the-counter. Works very well to keep sinuses clear and makes breathing easy. A bit more expensive than other nasal sprays but I feel it is worth it. Can buy multiple packs which makes it more affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Strope

customer_reviews.title: Came opened!
customer_reviews.text: My package came in opened. Afraid to use it. $24 down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Waterhouse

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Use this on recommendation of my allergist. This twin pack is a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen T.

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Helps with sinuses, allergies. start off twice a day and when you can use once.
customer_reviews.author: PublicNameUser101

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and not safe to use
customer_reviews.text: The shipping box was sealed but the product was unsealed when opening and came out in the first spray. I wish I would have read the other reviews before purchasing because Amazon will not return. Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Using for Years - IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: Been using Nasacort for years on end now. It really works. I love that I can get this on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Green

customer_reviews.title: Squirt up nose, happy all day
customer_reviews.text: The product is effective for most of the day, though I am not sure about the 24-hour efficacy claim because I'm usually unconscious for 8 of those hours.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Beware- spray arrived opened!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing-- this spray arrived completely opened. The backing was torn off the box, and the bottles are not plastic sealed. You can't use medication that has been opened.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works really welll
customer_reviews.text: When I used to wake up before taking Nasacort I would have to blow my nose many times for about 1 1/2 hours. Now I may blow my nose once or twice in that same time .Nasacort has worked very well for me but I am concerned about long term use. I have been using it for a couple months now every night. I would like to know if there are any studies on long term use. It is a life changing drug for me.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Way cheaper than in store!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff allows me to breathe so yeah its good! Way cheaper than in store.
customer_reviews.author: TheDrainnoodle

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: This really works for me and cleans out my sinuses.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Item received was damaged
customer_reviews.text: Product was already opened when delivered. Very disappointed. ***After contacting customer service I received a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jace

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I`m a mail carrier and this is all I use for allergies! Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: deborah mackersie

customer_reviews.title: This product keeps me from being a bedridden mess. ...
customer_reviews.text: This product keeps me from being a bedridden mess. If you have severe nasal allergies, giving this a try would not go amiss. You have to take it every day, though, or the effects diminish. Takes about a week when you first start using it before it reaches full strength.
customer_reviews.author: Fluffy the Gryphon

customer_reviews.title: Just what the Dr ordered
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. Only stuff that works for me and price here for 2 is what I was paying for 1.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: First one that has ever worked for me
customer_reviews.text: This is the first allergy spray that has ever worked for me, and I've tried everything available to date both OTC and RX. I'm allergic to every plant so suffer symptoms all year. When the pollen is too prolific I do have to add actifed tabs as well as use this spray, but it really helps cut down the symptoms quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: K. KingTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for nasal allergies and it works.
customer_reviews.author: BJG

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price.
customer_reviews.text: The price on this was cheaper than the generics. This works much better for me than Flonase.
customer_reviews.author: Gerrianne Holland

customer_reviews.title: Package torn open
customer_reviews.text: Package was torn wide open. Not even a small opening, but the entire cardboard front was off. Would not even give a refund or return.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Product came in opened box
customer_reviews.text: The bottles were supposed to be in sealed box but the seal was broken. There is no assurance that the bottles were not altered.
customer_reviews.author: emre

customer_reviews.title: Great nasal spray during allergy season.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I have seasonal allergies this nasal spray has helped us to feel much better . :)
customer_reviews.author: Always Forward

customer_reviews.title: Highly satisfied former mouth breather...
customer_reviews.text: I have come to really like this nasal spray. I have suffered from constantly having to breathe through my mouth for years but I was so glad when I finally gave this spray a chance. The difference is quite noticeable.Sometimes I catch myself by surprise when I realize that I've been sitting around breathing through my nose like a normal human being!
customer_reviews.author: Hassan B.

customer_reviews.title: love this pray to clear my sinus
customer_reviews.text: I used to use Advil...no more. I paid for ( 2) in this pack and paid less than I pay for 1 at Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Eskind

customer_reviews.title: Makes Allergy Season Bearable
customer_reviews.text: Most effective product I have used for allergy season. For me it was a game changer.
customer_reviews.author: Joyful56

customer_reviews.title: Package tampered
customer_reviews.text: The package came slightly open.. as if someone was testing it out. No way am i putting this in my nose.
customer_reviews.author: Noum Phojanakong

customer_reviews.title: lifesaver in the spring.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, helps with allergies in the spring. I take generic Claritin every day but in the spring I need additional help. This works great. The only thing I don't like is you have to wash the tip after awhile or it smells gross. But I guess it's from being up your nose every day. I didn't notice any side effects with the product.
customer_reviews.author: clearanceman

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Got me off of nasal spray in one week after being addicted for years.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson Brown

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This is the best one for my body. I have tried several other sniffing kinds and this one works best.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Open product!
customer_reviews.text: Product came open and looked used. It say you can't return it. A refund should be given.
customer_reviews.author: Debra A.

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: This is the only nasal spray that keeps my allergies at bay. This size Nasalcort last so much longer than the 120 sprays.
customer_reviews.author: K

product_meta.title: Nasacort Allergy 24HR Nasal Spray for Adults, Non-Drowsy & Alcohol-Free, 120 Sprays, 0.57 fl. oz. 2pk
product_meta.description: Size:0.57 Fl Oz (Pack of 2)Allergy congestion dulling your senses of smell, taste and hearing? Get back to enjoying life more fully with Nasacort Allergy 24HR Nasal Spray for Adults. Unlike an antihistamine, this allergy nasal spray is a powerful anti-inflammatory that works at the source to relieve your worst nasal allergy symptoms, including nasal congestion, sneezing, and runny and itchy nose for a full 24 hours. Nasacort Adult Non-Drowsy Allergy Nasal Spray is non-addictive and safe to use when used as directed with blood pressure medication*. Best of all, this nasal allergy spray is scent-free and alcohol-free. Enjoy all the smells, tastes and sounds in the world around you with 24-hour nasal allergy symptom relief from Nasacort. *Please consult with your doctor before taking Nasacort with any other medication
feature_bullets: INCLUDES: Two (2) 0.57 fl. oz. spray bottles of Nasacort Allergy 24HR Nasal Spray for Adults
24-HOUR RELIEF: Nasacort Nasal Spray provides a full 24 hours of relief from nasal allergy symptoms
MULTI-SYMPTOM RELIEF: Nasacort Spray relieves nasal allergy congestion, sneezing, and runny and itchy nose
NON-DROWSY: This alcohol-free and scent-free nasal allergy spray won't make you drowsy
Multi-Symptom, 24 hour Nasal Allergy Relief; 2 X 120 Nasal Spray

NON-ADDICTIVE: This over-the-counter nasal allergy spray is non-addictive and safe to use when used as directed with blood pressure medication* *Please consult with your doctor before taking Nasacort with any other medication
